name: Steel Intruder Prototype
description: This is the first public prototype of a game I am currently working on in Unity.   It's a fairly straight forward top down shooter.  There are a few known issues still, the objectives for the level tend to end up being relatively close to the starting point.  I intend to add upgrades, narrative elements, and of course significantly more levels.  I hope this prototype brings you some entertainment.  Feedback is most appreciated, and is actually the entire reason I am posting this build, never too early to start collecting feedback.  I will probably be updating this regularly for a while until I get all the main features into the prototype.
